description: Configuration for status issues created in study repositories. These issues track study progress and update Factory issue status when closed.

issues.title: ðŸ“‹ Protocol Development Complete
issues.body:
## Protocol Development Status

**This is a placeholder issue for demo purposes**

This issue represents the completion of the protocol development phase.

### Tasks (Demo Placeholders)
- [ ] Protocol document drafted
- [ ] Clinical review completed
- [ ] Technical review completed
- [ ] Final protocol approved

### Notes
When this issue is closed, the Factory tracking issue status will be updated to **Protocol Development**.

---
*This is a status tracking issue. Closing this issue will trigger an update to the Factory portfolio.*
